main_definition: Tasting very good; pleasing to the taste.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Excellent in flavor or taste, particularly when food is involved.
meanings_and_examples.example: The chocolate cake was incredibly delicious with its rich and creamy texture.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Attractive and enjoyable to the senses; often used metaphorically beyond just eating.
meanings_and_examples.example: Listening to her singing voice is always a delightful experience, it's like every note she hits is delicious.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Giving great satisfaction or pleasure when consumed or experienced.
meanings_and_examples.example: Reading books by his favorite author gives him such a delicious feeling of joy and relaxation.
